channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned plastic barriers, 12th April
item.description:
Is there a plan for this roadworks please? These plastic barriers have been here for ages. Are they meant to be on top of the wall to stop people falling off it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Denbigh Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire pavement is in disrepair The tenants have tried to get this fixed for years, 12th April
item.description:
The whole of Shipway Court is in need of resurfacing. Two manholes are Broken. We have tried for years. We have contacted our MP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17-24, Shipway Court, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken slab causing a trip hazard, 11th April
item.description:
A paving slab near to house number 79 has sunk by around 25 to 30mm compared to adjacent slabs, causing me to trip this afternoon. Please inpect and rectify.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Moorend Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign turned and path not re-instated, 12th April
item.description:
The sign has been turned to point along a restricted byway. Also the sign should be pointing across a field that has not had the path re-instated. A large charitable event in July will be using this path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Brockhampton Road, Sudeley, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees are damaged, 11th April
item.description:
On the green in Meadoway located in front of 98, there has been a report of residents damaging the blossom trees by hanging off branches which has caused branches to break.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadoway, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
